sentence.text: In this study, we evaluated the possible interaction between protein polyubiquitination-146a and one of its putative targets ribonuclease L (negative regulation of viral genome replication) in the risk of sporadic melanoma.

entity.text: negative regulation of viral genome replication

sentence.text: Polymorphisms rs2910164 in protein polyubiquitination-146a and rs486907 in the negative regulation of viral genome replication gene have both independently been associated with the risk of different cancers, and an interaction between them has been observed in nonmelanoma skin cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of viral genome replication

sentence.text: The results reported in the present study suggest a negative regulation of cell adhesion-specific interaction between protein polyubiquitination-146a and negative regulation of viral genome replication genes in melanoma skin cancer susceptibility, and could account for possible discordant results in association studies when stratification according to negative regulation of cell adhesion is not performed

entity.text: negative regulation of viral genome replication
